name: Fringe Wars
description:
Fringe Wars is a team-based multi-player space game that puts you in direct command of massive capital starships and propels you into tactical warfare. Get ready to customize your ships, soar among the galaxies and engage in fast-paced shooting episodes for fame and glory.



STORYLINE

After thousands of years filled with war and sanguinary conflict, the Galaxy is now dominated by three main powers: the Terra Empire, the Titanium Information-Industrial Complex, and the Federation of Free Planets.

The struggle for asteroid belts rich with resources and important jumping points, the small conflicts in borders of the three powers has never stopped.

You are a part of the Star Mercenaries, the dogs of war who soar among the galaxies fighting on behalf of the three powers for money and glory. Get ready to choose your own ships, soar among the galaxies, and engage in fast-paced shooting episodes for fame and glory.



FEATURES

Fight Fast-paced, Multi-player Space Battles!
From desert planetary surfaces to starry asteroid belts rich in resources, compete in epic arena battles, reap your plunders of war, and cement your status as one of the greatest and richest fighters the galaxy has ever seen.
Choose from Different Ship Types!
There are different ship types suitable for different usages in battle. For example, the corvette is small, light and fast, which makes it the best scout in battle, while battleships with heavy armor and shields can obliterate your enemy with its firepower.
Customize Your Own Unique Ship!
Get ready to customize your own unique space ships as you level up! As captain of your own ship, you can swap out modules with different equipment such as weapons to change the stats, loadout, and abilities of your ship.

Cooperate with Your Teammates!
In Fringe Wars, it won’t take just cunning and skill to win - cooperation is the key. With different battlefield environment and different ship types, you must strategize with your teammates if you want to reap the spoils of war.

Play in Different Battle Modes!
Choose from different battle modes as you please – try out Death Match mode if you’re hungering to put your combat skills to test or Domination Mode if you’re looking to hone your strategic skills and take over stations rich in resources.
